summary: The implementation covers most requirements but is missing the Van Gogh background image generation (REQ-1) and App.tsx routing updates (REQ-7). The diff shows CSS styling, Tailwind config, and HomePage component changes, but no actual image file or App.tsx modifications are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a Van Gogh-inspired background image with vibrant, swirling colors and brushstroke textures suitable for a homepage hero section (dimensions: 1920x1080)
missing_requirements.reason: No image file was generated or added. The HomePage.tsx references '/assets/generated/vangogh-hero.dim_1920x1080.png' but this file is not present in the added files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the App.tsx routing to direct users to the new unified homepage as the default route, ensuring it replaces the current HomePage while maintaining access to PersonalizedHomePage logic for authenticated users
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx is not in the modified files list. The routing changes to make the Van Gogh homepage the default route were not implemented.
